ddst
  • Reference

    Beta version of ddst package

    The CRAN version is here: http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ddst/

    ddst stands for Data Driven Smooth Test Detailed description of this package is available here: http://www.biecek.pl/R/ddst/description.pdf

    This package is developed by the MI^2 group. MI^2 (pronounce: Am I square?) is a group of mathematicians and computer scientists that love to play with data. We create tools, do consulting and share our positive attitude.
